name: ai-appium-lens

scripts.uninstall: export APPIUM_HOME=/Users/anil-patidar/.appium && (appium plugin uninstall ai-appium-lens || exit 0)
scripts.install-plugin: export APPIUM_HOME=/Users/anil-patidar/.appium && npm run build && appium plugin install --source=local $(pwd)
scripts.reinstall-plugin: export APPIUM_HOME=/Users/anil-patidar/.appium && (appium plugin uninstall ai-appium-lens || exit 0) && npm run install-plugin

author: anil patidar
description:
Revolutionizing Test Automation with AI-Enabled Appium Plugin, Harnessing AI for Intelligent UI Interactions and Accessibility Insights , An AI-powered Appium plugin that combines:
Google Vision Vertex AI for UI analysis.
Gemini NLP for natural language understanding.
Designed to make mobile app automation smarter, more intuitive, and accessible.

appium.pluginDescription: AI-powered Appium plugin that combines Google Vision Vertex AI for UI analysis and Gemini NLP for natural language understanding. Designed to make mobile app automation smarter, more intuitive, and accessible.
